Core API Reference

This section documents the core classes and functions of the AI Agent Framework.

Agent

class agent_framework.core.agent.Agent(planner: BasePlanner, memory: BaseMemory, tools: List[BaseTool] | Dict[str, BaseTool], policies: Dict[str, Any], event_bus: EventBus | None = None, name: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, version: str | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Policy-driven agent with explicit behavior control.

__init__(planner: BasePlanner, memory: BaseMemory, tools: List[BaseTool] | Dict[str, BaseTool], policies: Dict[str, Any], event_bus: EventBus | None = None, name: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, version: str | None = None) → None[source]
async run(task: str, progress_handler: BaseProgressHandler | None = None, script: List[Dict[str, Any]] | None = None, script_metadata: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, execution_context: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, suggested_plan: List[Dict[str, Any]] | None = None) → Any[source]

Execute task with policy-driven behavior control.

ManagerAgent

class agent_framework.core.manager_v2.ManagerAgent(planner: BasePlanner, memory: BaseMemory, workers: List[Any] | Dict[str, Any], policies: Dict[str, Any], tools: List[BaseTool] | Dict[str, BaseTool] | None = None, event_bus: EventBus | None = None, name: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, version: str | None = None, synthesis_gateway: Any | None = None, synthesis_prompt: str | None = None, synthesizer_agent: Any | None = None, job_store: BaseJobStore | None = None)[source]

Bases: object

Policy-driven manager with configurable delegation and follow-ups.

__init__(planner: BasePlanner, memory: BaseMemory, workers: List[Any] | Dict[str, Any], policies: Dict[str, Any], tools: List[BaseTool] | Dict[str, BaseTool] | None = None, event_bus: EventBus | None = None, name: str | None = None, description: str | None = None, version: str | None = None, synthesis_gateway: Any | None = None, synthesis_prompt: str | None = None, synthesizer_agent: Any | None = None, job_store: BaseJobStore | None = None) → None[source]
async run(task: str, progress_handler: BaseProgressHandler | None = None, strategic_plan: Dict[str, Any] | None = None, context: str | None = None) → Dict[str, Any][source]

Execute task with policy-driven behavior control.

class agent_framework.core.events.EventBus[source]
